Author: NightmareXIV and AsunaTsuki
Name: DynamicBridge
Punchline: Allows you to automatically change your appearance based on various conditions.
Description: Automates character appearance changes through rule-based presets, utilizing integration with other popular customization plugins. This enables seamless and context-sensitive transformations, enriching gameplay and increasing immersion.
Changelog:
Changes since last release version:
- Fixed changing to the same gearset not reapplying preset
- Fixed issue with JP text
- Completely reworked profile system. Instead of character-based system, now profiles are created individually and assigned for specific characters.
- Added setting to temporarily disable DynamicBridge
- Added experimental fallback preset feature. Designs from that preset will be treated as defaults for profile instead of game defaults.
- Added an option to enable fltering folders per profile. This applies to both Customize+ and Glamourer.
- Added incognito mode that can be enabled in settings
- UI has been reworked
- Added mini-tutorial
- Added an option to split base classes and jobs
